text: Let's take a look at the structure of Module 3. As you will recall from Module 1 and 2, every single module comprises of theoretical, practical and playbook application. In Module 3 you can expect 9 theoretical principles. There will be 4 blackboard learning series which show your learning videos. We will then have profile replays which we will utilise throughout all the strategy You will then at the end of every single part have the usual concept checker whereby I can ensure you understand the principles dealt with. And then as usual we'll finish every single part with a playbook entry where you can update your playbook accordingly. In this module there will be 11 different questions to update in your playbook. Good luck!
